name: prmssnn

body.origin:
|- wss(cprime, cn)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
-| diffsc(hs0, cprime)
-| diffsc(hs0, cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ Prime ⊆ ℕ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Prime → hs0 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ d(hs0, Prime)
⊣ d(hs0, ℕ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cprime, cn)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
-| diffsc(hs0, cprime)
-| diffsc(hs0, cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Prime ⊆ ℕ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Prime → hs0 ∈ ℕ)
⊣ d(hs0, Prime)
⊣ d(hs0, ℕ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cprime, cn)
-| diffsc(hs0, cprime)
-| diffsc(hs0, cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Prime ⊆ ℕ
⊣ d(hs0, Prime)
⊣ d(hs0, ℕ)

comment: The prime numbers are a subset of the positive integers. (Contributed by AV, 22-Jul-2020.)
